member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.Validation.CustomValidator
member.summary: Class for custom validation.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.Validation.CustomValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.Models.RecordData)
member.summary: This method validates parameters from given class.
member.exception: Thrown when the first name is null. or Thrown when the last name is null.

Thrown when first or last name less MinNameLength or more than MaxNameLength. or Thrown when first or last name consists of white spaces. or Thrown when date of birth less MinDate or more than Current Date. or Thrown when sex is not M or F with ignore case. or Thrown when height less MinHeight or more than MaxHeight.

member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.Validation.DefaultValidator
member.summary: Class for dafault validation.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.Validation.DefaultValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.Models.RecordData)
member.summary: This method validates parameters from given class.
member.exception: Thrown when the first name is null. or Thrown when the last name is null.

Thrown when first or last name less MinNameLength or more than MaxNameLength. or Thrown when first or last name consists of white spaces. or Thrown when date of birth less MinDate or more than Current Date. or Thrown when sex is not M or F with ignore case. or Thrown when height less MinHeight or more than MaxHeight.
